thread.title: [Video] Cyber Caremark: Protecting Your Board from Shareholder Derivative Litigation After a Data Loss Event
thread.title_full: [Video] Cyber Caremark: Protecting Your Board from Shareholder Derivative Litigation After a Data Loss Event

author: Carlton Fields Jorden Burt
title: [Video] Cyber Caremark: Protecting Your Board from Shareholder Derivative Litigation After a Data Loss Event
text:
Embed 
To embed, copy and paste the code into your website or blog: A company’s board of directors has an important oversight role in protecting its company’s assets and its shareholders’ interests in an environment of increasing cyber threats. Former criminal Assistant U.S. Attorneys and Computer Hacking and Intellectual Property prosecutors John E. Clabby and Joseph W. Swanson discuss key steps that a company should take now to minimize its exposure to cyber litigation in this half-hour "CFJB on Cyber" See more 
*Transcript coming soon. See
